NAME AS org_name, employee_info.user_name AS apply_user_name, case_apply.apply_user_name AS apply_user_name2, sur_user_emp.user_name AS sur_user_name, case_info.color FROM case_apply LEFT JOIN case_info ON case_apply.case_id = case_info.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT case_paid.case_id, SUM(paid_num) AS paid_num FROM case_paid WHERE case_paid.state = 2 GROUP BY case_paid.case_id ) AS tb ON case_info.id = tb.case_id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON cb.id = case_info.batch_id LEFT JOIN entrust ON entrust.id = cb.entrust_id
LEFT JOIN sys_organization ON case_info.org_id = sys_organization.id LEFT JOIN employee_info ON case_apply.apply_user = employee_info.id LEFT JOIN employee_info AS sur_user_emp ON case_apply.sur_user = sur_user_emp.id WHERE case_apply.apply_type = 1 and case_info.status != -1 and ( case_info.org_id IN ( ${params.queryOrgs} )
OR cb.entrust_id IN (${params.attachEntrustId})
OR 1=1
)
and case_info.`state`IN ('0','1','4')
and case_info.`state`IN ('0','1','4','3')
and entrust.`id` = #{params.entrustId}
AND case_apply.state = #{params.applyState}
